padam karanna gaththama ena maduru senawa api ekek ussagena yanna tharam balawath.ee welawata ithin wate pite thiyana deyak ahulagena gini godak gahagannawa.maduru dangara wisayi kiyanawa ne.padam karanna kisima sudusu watapitawak nathi unu apita nawaka wadaya wadayaktath wada windanayak wune me dukata wada nawaka wadaya honda yayi hithunu hinda wenna athi.jiwa widyawa karana unta wishayan 15k 16k,bhauthika widyawa karana untath wishayan 13k 14k set wenawa.mewwa ekinekata hath pasinma wenas ewwa hinda padam karanna giyama adila aapahu adenawa.me wage watapitawaka kollo hitiye.kollo tika pitayata aasannaye hitiyath kello tika hitiye eetath ehayin gama maddata wenna.apita wagema untath prashna.hama gamakama naheta ahannathi un innawa ne.ee pathi walath ehemayi.un athin hinsana walata lak wunu ape kello thawamath ehima wasaya karanne unge thiyana edithara kama wagema aathma wishwasaya hindayi.eth thawamath unge jiwitha walata thiyana awadanama gana balanna mokek wath na.
